channel.title: Projects on nRF5dev
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on nRF5dev

item.title: nRF52 BLE tester project
item.description: The project is about building a mobile app to control your nRF52 based development kit. The project has 2 parts : Part1 : The 1st part is about building the nRF52 firmware. the firmware is based on the nRF5 SDK and uses Segger as a toolchain. Part2 : The 2nd part is about building the mobile app. the app is based on the ionic frameword and uses Anguolar for the fornt end.
